attributes.action: Demand the resignation of Councillor Liz Harvey.
attributes.additional_details: For unpatriotic and anti British acts in public office by trying to ban the flying of the Union Jack.
attributes.background: Councillor Liz Harvey has tried to ban the flying of the nations flag in her constituency of Ledbury.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for the views of local councillors. You could raise this issue directly with Ledbury Town Council:

http://www.ledburytowncouncil.gov.uk/Contact_Us.aspx
